name: Third Eye Spiritual Chakra
description: Third Eye Spiritual Healing Chakra involves increasing awareness, releasing blocks and creating more flow through these energy centers. Also learn about the energy centers in the hands and feet. Discover the most effective tools for balancing & healing the energy centres.  Guided Meditation develops awareness of energy, supports releasing personal blocks, and helps you create a healthy flow in your system. Practice centering & grounding, and give yourself a healing with this meditation for the 7 energy centers.  Features Include-  Spiritual Chakra Healing meditation will give you Mantras for the Spiritual Awakening Meditation Chakra Training will help you with your Chakra Balance System. Recite and Chant these Mantras for the Chakras with OM Meditation for Self Healing You can Calm your mind and heal yourself which is as great as heal your life.  Other mehods include Crystals Healing Calm- Meditate Sleep Relax with the Mantras for the Spritual Meditation You can try the Spiritual Personality Test The best Buddhist Meditation Trainer App available Psychic Energy Oracle Deck and Vibrational Energy Oracle Deck Unlock Your spiritual energy and Spiritual healing and Spiritual Awakening meditation  With the free spiritual reading Spiritual Advisor or spiritual guru will give you Spiritual Answers and Spiritual Awakening Guidance on spiritualism.  Other Benefits include Yoga with meditation music and reflexology how to meditate in shiatsu kundalini yoga techniques of vipassana clairvoyant guided meditation mindfulness meditation with biofeedback
